plot: Police Lieutenant Naomi Warren follows a lead provided by Metro Crime Blogger Lora Engdahl related to the deaths of 3 undercover officers and uncovers corruption within her own detectives division.
title: Chicago Heat
plot_es: Police Lieutenant Naomi Warren follows a lead provided by Metro Crime Blogger Lora Engdahl related to the deaths of 3 undercover officers and uncovers corruption within her own detectives division.
plot_en: Police Lieutenant Naomi Warren follows a lead provided by Metro Crime Blogger Lora Engdahl related to the deaths of 3 undercover officers and uncovers corruption within her own detectives division.
